Name: Celadon
About the game: A tightly designed, precision platformer with a large variety of mechanics and over 100 platforming challenges! Jump, dash and glide your way past spikes to get to the end. Teleport past walls, summon a moving cloud platform to cross gaps, recharge your dashes midair, change form, use many different types of dashes, grapple hook to nearby terrain, Cleverly gain enough height to scale tall obstacles. Use multiple new move sets over seven chapters. For players of all skill levels to enjoy!
